core_attributes_media_type: Type of media (e.g., video, image, etc.)
core_attributes_aspect_ratio: Aspect ratio of the media (e.g., 16:9, 1:1, etc.)
core_attributes_duration_bucket: Category of media duration (e.g., short, medium, long)
core_attributes_hook_type: Type of opening hook (e.g., problem, question, curiosity)
core_attributes_pacing: Overall pacing of the ad (e.g., fast, slow, moderate)
core_attributes_scene_count: Number of distinct scenes in the creative
core_attributes_cut_frequency: How often cuts occur within the media
core_attributes_primary_platform: Apparent target platform (e.g., Instagram, YouTube, Facebook)
core_attributes_content_category: Primary content category (e.g., product demo, lifestyle, testimonial)
core_attributes_cta_type: Type of call to action (e.g., button, text, link)
core_attributes_cta_placement: When CTA appears in the creative (e.g., beginning, middle, end)
core_attributes_language: Primary language of the content (e.g., English, Hindi)
core_attributes_text_amount: Amount of on-screen text (e.g., minimal, moderate, heavy)
core_attributes_production_quality: Overall production quality (e.g., professional, UGC style, polished)
element_presence_has_person: Is there a person visible in the creative?
element_presence_has_face: Is there a clearly visible face in the creative?
element_presence_has_face_closeup: Is there a close-up shot of the face?
element_presence_has_product: Is there a product visible in the creative?
element_presence_has_product_in_use: Is the product being used or demonstrated in the creative?
element_presence_has_packaging: Is the product packaging visible in the creative?
element_presence_has_text_overlay: Is there on-screen text overlaid on the video?
element_presence_has_captions: Are captions or subtitles present in the creative?
element_presence_has_logo: Is the brand logo visible in the creative?
element_presence_has_logo_intro: Does the logo appear within the first 3 seconds?
element_presence_has_price: Is the price displayed in the creative?
element_presence_has_discount: Is there mention of a discount or sale?
element_presence_has_countdown: Is a countdown timer present in the creative?
element_presence_has_before_after: Is there a before/after comparison present?
element_presence_has_split_screen: Is a split screen composition used?
element_presence_has_green_screen: Is a green screen or virtual background used?
element_presence_has_screen_recording: Is a screen recording or demo shown in the creative?
element_presence_has_animation: Are animated elements used in the creative?
element_presence_has_motion_graphics: Are motion graphics or kinetic text used?
element_presence_has_testimonial_quote: Is there a customer quote or testimonial in the creative?
element_presence_has_review_stars: Are review stars displayed in the creative?
element_presence_has_social_proof_number: Is a number used as social proof (e.g., '5M sold')?
element_presence_has_hands: Are hands visible in the creative (e.g., unboxing or demo)?
element_presence_has_animal: Are animals featured in the creative?
element_presence_has_food: Is food visible in the creative?
element_presence_has_nature: Is nature or an outdoor setting featured?
element_presence_has_urban: Is there an urban or city setting used?
element_presence_has_interior: Is there an indoor or interior setting in the creative?
format_types_is_ugc_style: Does the creative have a user-generated content aesthetic?
format_types_is_testimonial: Is the creative in a customer testimonial format?
format_types_is_unboxing: Is the creative in an unboxing/reveal format?
format_types_is_tutorial: Is the creative in a tutorial/how-to format?
format_types_is_comparison: Is the creative in a comparison/vs format?
format_types_is_listicle: Is the creative in a list format (e.g., 'top 5 reasons')?
format_types_is_problem_solution: Is the creative based on a problem-solution narrative?
format_types_is_day_in_life: Is the creative in a day-in-the-life format?
format_types_is_asmr: Is the creative based on ASMR or sensory focus?
format_types_is_reaction: Is the creative in a reaction format?
format_types_is_duet_stitch: Is the creative based on a duet/stitch format with other content?
format_types_is_trend_based: Is the creative based on a trending format or sound?
visual_style_visual_style: Describe the overall visual style of the creative (e.g., minimal, modern, vintage)
visual_style_lighting_type: What is the lighting type in the creative (e.g., natural, studio, mixed)?
visual_style_color_scheme: What is the dominant color scheme in the creative (e.g., warm, neutral, cool)?
visual_style_color_saturation: What is the color saturation level (e.g., high, moderate, low)?
visual_style_contrast_level: What is the contrast level in the creative (e.g., high, low, moderate)?
visual_style_camera_angle: What is the primary camera angle (e.g., eye level, high angle, low angle)?
visual_style_camera_movement: What is the primary camera movement (e.g., tracking, panning, static)?
visual_style_shot_composition: What is the primary shot composition (e.g., centered, asymmetrical, minimal)?
visual_style_framing_style: What is the framing approach (e.g., close-up, wide shot, over-the-shoulder)?
visual_style_depth_of_field: What is the depth of field in the creative (e.g., shallow, deep, layered)?
visual_style_filter_applied: Is there a noticeable filter or preset applied to the creative?
visual_style_has_vignette: Is there a vignette effect applied to the creative?
visual_style_has_grain: Is there a film grain effect applied to the creative?
visual_style_has_lens_flare: Is there a lens flare effect in the creative?
visual_style_has_bokeh: Is there a bokeh (background blur) effect in the creative?
visual_style_text_style: Describe the on-screen text style (e.g., bold, sans serif, serif).
visual_style_transition_style: What is the primary transition style in the creative (e.g., fade, slide, cut)?
visual_style_aspect_fill: Does the content fill the frame (e.g., no letterboxing)?
visual_style_safe_zone_compliance: Are key elements in the safe zones for visual balance?
visual_style_thumbnail_appeal: How appealing is the thumbnail or first frame of the creative?
visual_style_visual_hierarchy: What is the clarity of the visual hierarchy in the creative?
visual_style_brand_consistency: Is there brand visual consistency maintained throughout the creative?
content_theme_primary_theme: Describe the primary content theme of the creative (e.g., lifestyle, product demo, tutorial)
content_theme_emotional_tone: What is the overall emotional tone of the creative (e.g., joyful, dramatic, suspenseful)?
content_theme_narrative_style: What is the narrative approach of the creative (e.g., storytelling, informational)?
content_theme_story_arc: Describe the story structure of the creative (e.g., problem→solution, conflict→resolution).
content_theme_key_benefit_focus: What is the primary benefit emphasized in the creative?
content_theme_objection_addressed: Does the creative address a common objection? If so, what is it?
content_theme_social_context: Is there any social context shown in the creative (e.g., group setting, family scenario)?
content_theme_time_context: What is the time of day or context implied in the creative (e.g., morning, evening)?
brand_business_brand_mention_timing: When is the brand mentioned in the creative (e.g., early, middle, end)?
brand_business_brand_integration: How is the brand integrated into the creative (e.g., logo, product usage, brand colors)?
brand_business_price_positioning: What is the price positioning signal in the creative (e.g., premium, affordable, value)?
brand_business_target_audience_signal: What is the apparent target audience for this creative (e.g., young adults, tech enthusiasts)?
brand_business_industry_vertical: What industry category is represented in the creative (e.g., fashion, tech, health)?
brand_business_purchase_intent_stage: What funnel stage is targeted in the creative (e.g., awareness, consideration, conversion)?
brand_business_seasonality: Is the creative seasonally relevant (e.g., summer, holiday season)?
persuasion_frameworks_stopp_story: Does the creative contain a story element? (e.g., narrative arc, problem-solution)
persuasion_frameworks_stopp_testimonial: Does the creative contain a testimonial element (e.g., customer quote, review)?
persuasion_frameworks_stopp_offer: Is a clear offer presented in the creative (e.g., discount, bonus)?
persuasion_frameworks_stopp_proof: Does the creative show proof or evidence (e.g., product demo, customer success)?
persuasion_frameworks_stopp_push: Is there a push or urgency element in the creative (e.g., countdown, limited-time)?
persuasion_frameworks_aida_attention: Is there an attention-grabbing element in the creative (e.g., bold headline, shocking reveal)?
persuasion_frameworks_aida_interest: Does the creative build interest (e.g., benefits, curiosity)?
persuasion_frameworks_aida_desire: Does the creative create desire (e.g., aspirational imagery, emotional appeal)?
persuasion_frameworks_aida_action: Is there an action prompt present in the creative (e.g., shop now, learn more)?
persuasion_frameworks_bab_before: Is there a before state shown in the creative (e.g., problem, struggle)?
persuasion_frameworks_bab_after: Is there an after state shown in the creative (e.g., solution, success)?
persuasion_frameworks_bab_bridge: Is there a bridge or solution presented in the creative (e.g., demo, features)?
persuasion_frameworks_uses_scarcity: Scarcity tactic present in the creative (e.g., limited time, only a few left)
persuasion_frameworks_uses_urgency: Urgency tactic present in the creative (e.g., time-sensitive offer, countdown timer)
persuasion_frameworks_uses_authority: Authority/expert signals present (e.g., expert endorsement, celebrity appearance)
persuasion_frameworks_uses_social_proof: Social proof present (e.g., reviews, testimonials, user count)
persuasion_frameworks_uses_reciprocity: Reciprocity tactic present (e.g., free gift, thank you offer)
persuasion_frameworks_uses_liking: Liking/relatability elements present (e.g., relatable character, friendly tone)
persuasion_frameworks_uses_commitment: Commitment/consistency elements present (e.g., ongoing subscription, loyalty program)
behavioral_axes_core_axis_social_proof: Social proof intensity in the creative (0 to 1 scale)
behavioral_axes_core_axis_trust_authorit: Trust/authority signals in the creative (0 to 1 scale)
behavioral_axes_core_axis_emotional_appe: Emotional vs rational appeal (0 to 1 scale)
behavioral_axes_core_axis_audio_importan: Audio importance to message (0 to 1 scale)
behavioral_axes_core_axis_brand_focus: Brand vs product focus (0 to 1 scale)
first_frame_first_frame_content: Primary first frame content (e.g., face, product, text, action)
first_frame_first_frame_emotion: First frame emotional trigger (e.g., curiosity, surprise, recognition)
first_frame_first_frame_text: Text visible in the first frame (True/False)
first_frame_first_frame_face: Face visible in the first frame (True/False)
first_frame_first_frame_product: Product visible in the first frame (True/False)
first_frame_first_frame_contrast: Visual contrast level in the first frame (e.g., low, medium, high)
first_frame_first_frame_color_pop: Eye-catching color in the first frame (True/False)
first_frame_thumb_stop_potential: Thumb-stop potential (e.g., low, medium, high, very_high)
first_frame_first_3s_hook_strength: First 3 seconds hook strength (e.g., weak, moderate, strong, very_strong)
copy_analysis_headline_type: Headline/hook text type (e.g., question, statement, command)
copy_analysis_copy_tone: Overall copy tone (e.g., casual, professional, urgent)
copy_analysis_uses_power_words: Does the copy use power words (True/False)
copy_analysis_cta_clarity: Clarity of the CTA (e.g., unclear, moderate, clear, very_clear)
copy_analysis_text_readability: On-screen text readability (e.g., poor, adequate, good, excellent)
copy_analysis_message_clarity: Overall message clarity (e.g., unclear, moderate, clear, very_clear)
